bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: King William County was formed in 1701 from King and Queen County.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records, 1796-1863, of King William County Circuit Court consist of documents related to judgments (1796, 1797, 1805, 1828, 1829); fiduciary records (1818); tax and fiscal records (1804, 1816); will of Lewis Littlepage (1863); and marriage licenses (1823, 1840.)

originalsloc.head: Location of Originals
originalsloc.p: Originals are located at the Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional King William County court records, marriage records, wills, tax and fiscal records, and fiduciary records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm.

King William County is one of Virginia's Lost Records Localities. Additional King William County Court Records may be found in the Virginia Lost Records Localities Collection at the Library of Virginia. Search the Lost Records Localities Database found at the Library of Virginia web site.
